Description: Chennai Metro Rail Limited (CMRL) has awarded the operation and maintenance contract for its Phase II network to Delhi Metro Rail Corporation.

Description: Expansion planned for Sir Ganga Ram Hospital in New Delhi.

Title: Greenlam Industries plans resin manufacturing unit in Sabarkantha, Gujarat
Description: Greenlam Industries proposes to establish a resin manufacturing plant within its existing laminate facility at Sabarkantha, Gujarat.

Description: AM/NS India is set to commission its 2 million tonne auto-focused cold rolling mill (CRM) in Hazira, Gujarat.

Description: Wipro Limited is expanding its campus in Gopanapally, Hyderabad, with a new IT center expected to be completed

Description: EcoBox Industrial Parks, an arm of Alta Capitals Logicap Advisors, has acquired 50 acres in Mannur, Chennai, for a logistics project.

Description: India's first hydrogen train begins trials, marking a new era in sustainable rail travel. This project would require steel for the train and potentially for supporting infrastructure.

Title: BEL Wins ₹2,463 Crore Radar Contract from Indian Air Force
Description: BEL has secured a contract worth ₹2,463 Crore from the Indian Air Force for radar systems.

Title: Hanwha Aerospace signs 371.4 billion won contract to export K9 howitzers to India
Description: Hanwha Aerospace has signed a contract to export K9 howitzers to India.

Title: DMRC wins ₹5,870 Crore O&M Contract for Chennai Metro Phase 2 Corridors
Description: Delhi Metro won the Operations and Maintenance contract for Chennai Metro Phase 2 Corridors.

Title: KEC International Secures Rs 12.36 Bn Orders
Description: KEC International Ltd., has secured new orders worth Rs 12.36 Bn.

Title: Hindustan Power bags 425 MW solar project contract from UPPCL
Description: Hindustan Power has secured a 425 MW solar project from Uttar Pradesh Power Corporation Limited (UPPCL).

Title: SWERL's Hybrid EPC Contracts for Indian Renewable Energy
Description: Sterling and Wilson Renewable Energy has secured three new hybrid and solar EPC contracts, bringing the company into wind power.

Title: BHEL, Hitachi Energy consortium bags contract for 6-GW renewable energy transmission project
Description: Hitachi Energy India and BHEL have won a contract to create a 6000 MW, 950-km high-voltage direct current link to transmit renewable energy from Rajasthan.
